recipes.cooking_method:
1. Cut chicken into small pieces and marinate with cornstarch and soy sauce. 
2. Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry chicken until brown. 
3. Add hoisin sauce and dried red chilies. Stir-fry until chicken is cooked through. 
4. Serve with rice.

1. Cook rice and let it cool. 
2. Beat eggs in a bowl. Heat oil in a wok and scramble the eggs. 
3. Add diced carrots and peas to the wok and stir-fry until vegetables are cooked. 
4. Add rice and stir-fry until rice is heated through. 
5. Garnish with chopped scallions.

1. Bring chicken broth to a boil in a pot. 
2. Add diced tofu, sliced mushrooms, and sliced bamboo shoots. Simmer until vegetables are tender. 
3. Beat eggs in a bowl and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly. 
4. Season with vinegar, soy sauce, and white pepper. 
5. Serve hot.
